item.description:
Arts & Creative Cultural Events Holiday Party

6-11:30pm

Thought it would be nice to have our own private Holiday celebration.  Jules has kindly arranged for us to gather at his condo clubhouse in Branford. 

We are asking for $10.00 from all attending to put towards rental fee and other party suprises.... 

This is BYOB, and bring either a side dish, appetizer or dessert, (please post what you intend to bring, so that we do not duplicate). Jules is making a turkey and a ham. We will have holiday punch, other assorted treats, dancing music, so wear your dancing shoes. Musicians bring your instruments...More details to the merriment to come, so stay tuned!

We will send out directions to those attending.

Please bring a homemade ornament to hang on our holiday tree, be creative,this is all, no stress, silly, whimsical fun and should prove interesting.

A break down of what we have so far:

Turkey and Ham
Side dishes:
potato or macaroni salad
lasana or other pasta dish
Vegetable Lasagna
garbonzo bean salad Garden Salad

Veggie side dish

Appetizers:
deviled eggs
veggies and hummus

sweet and sour meatballs

Mexican Appetizer

Shrimp Ring

 

Desserts:
dessert - Pam's suprise...
Holiday Banana Bread
cheesecake
mini eclair

italian cookies

We will have nonalcoholic beverages and Sangria as well.
item.name: Holiday Party
